name: Magus's Entrenchment
desc:
A 20 foot square centered on target point within range becomes magically infused to preserve its current state. It can't be changed from normal terrain to difficult terrain or vice versa, and spells that would create a persistent area of effect on that ground instead fail to have any effect on the area.

This spell preserves any existing effects in the area, suspending their duration until the end of this spell.
author: CrusaderDroid
